attributes.action: legalise controlled-strength cannabis in the UK.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
The amount of users of Cannabis in the UK is growing daily, and many as smoking a potent strain known as skunk. Skunk contains high levels of THC, the active ingredient in cannabis, sometimes over 20%. 

We propose the goverment legalise Cannabis with a THC content of under 5% in the UK. This is too allow people to smoke Cannabis with dramatically reduced health dangers and to not waste police time.
